Kitchen X Warz

Written in 2020.

The Kitchenettes have had ENOUGH of the HUE-MANS! They have decided to pick their 5 strongest Kitchenees, and have them duke it out to see who will lead them in WAR. See what happens!

Practice project.

Written & Illustratd by Rid O1.
